description: Stay at my place and take care of my cat... discount in price bonus in a furry friend! My place is close to The Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park, Restaurants, Coffee Shops, Yoga Studios, and lots of trains. You’ll love my place because of the location, the neighborhood, the value you're getting, the light you get through windows in the living room and bedroom, and the convenience. We'll communicate about cat care details once you're interested...
name: One Bedroom in Prospect Heights with a Cat!
review: The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
